Author: almondbones
Text: Don't worry. No one here is going to tell you that. We understand the struggle is a lot stronger than people that have never had problems with food perceive it to be. I'm sure it's hard for them to grasp the idea that we've labeled our fuel as our enemy. I'm here for you and know that you can get better. Life is so hard with an ED, but finding the right people to support you is so important. Take one step at a time and you'll find yourself where you want to be.
